typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Permit(address owner,address spender,uint256 value,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)"

arguments.value: Permit(address owner,address spender,uint256 value,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)

documentation.text:
@dev Changes the owner address.
 @param newOwner Address of a new owner.

@dev Changes the minter address.
 @param newMinter Address of a new minter.

@dev Gets the reminder of OLAS possible for the mint.
 @return remainder OLAS token remainder.

@dev Burns OLAS tokens.
 @param amount OLAS token amount to burn.

userdoc.notice: Modern and gas efficient ERC20 + EIP-2612 implementation.

devdoc.author: Solmate (https://github.com/transmissions11/solmate/blob/main/src/tokens/ERC20.sol)Modified from Uniswap (https://github.com/Uniswap/uniswap-v2-core/blob/master/contracts/UniswapV2ERC20.sol)
devdoc.details: Do not manually set balances without updating totalSupply, as the sum of all user balances must not exceed it.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: This implementation does not decrease spender allowance if the maximum allowance was granted.The underflow condition is treated by the default code generation check.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: The overflow condition is treated by the default code generation check.

inflationControl(uint256).notice: The `<=` check is left as is for a better code readability.

mint(address,uint256).notice: If the inflation control does not pass, the revert does not take place, as well as no action is performed.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Decreases the allowance of another account over their tokens.

params.spender: Account that tokens are approved for.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Increases the allowance of another account over their tokens.

inflationControl(uint256).details: Provides various checks for the inflation control.
